name: EXTRACT_CONTENT_ITEM
title: EXTRACT_CONTENT_ITEM
description: Abstract model of a wrapper for one content item in an Extract, containing various meta-data. Indicates whether it was part of the primary set and what its original path was. Intended to be subtyped for wrappers of specific types of content.

element.short: Abstract model of a wrapper for one content item in an Extract, containing various meta-data.
element.definition: Abstract model of a wrapper for one content item in an Extract, containing various meta-data. Indicates whether it was part of the primary set and what its original path was. Intended to be subtyped for wrappers of specific types of content.

element.short: True if the content item carried in this container was part of the primary set for the Extract, i.
element.definition: True if the content item carried in this container was part of the primary set for the Extract, i.e. not added due to link-following.

element.short: True if the content item carried in this container is any kind of change since last send, in repeat sending situations.
element.definition: True if the content item carried in this container is any kind of change since last send, in repeat sending situations.

element.short: True if the content of this item has not been included due to insufficient access rights of requestor.
element.definition: True if the content of this item has not been included due to insufficient access rights of requestor.
